scripts.activate: docker exec -i -w /etc/apache2/sites-available apache a2ensite jwfinanceira.conf && docker exec -i apache service apache2 reload
scripts.cls: docker exec -i -w /var/www/html/api-laravel apache php artisan cache:clear && docker exec -i -w /var/www/html/api-laravel apache php artisan config:clear
scripts.create-db: echo 'CREATE DATABASE api_laravel;' | docker exec -i postgres psql -U postgres
scripts.reset-db: docker exec -i -w /var/www/html/api-laravel apache php artisan migrate:fresh && docker exec -i -w /var/www/html/api-laravel apache php artisan db:seed
scripts.update: npm update && docker exec -i -w /var/www/html/api-laravel apache composer update
